class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98e8ff">Ships </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0c070">Purple </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e4ffa2">gently </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">toss </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4064ff">Seas </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0c070">Daffodil </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4064ff">Fantastic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">Sailors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffacc8">mingle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span style="color:#4064ff">Wharf </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">still! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span
